Class MeasureInstrument<Q extends Quantity<Q>>

java.lang.Object
org.jscience.measure.MeasureInstrument<Q>
Type Parameters:
Q - The type of quantity measured by this instrument.
All Implemented Interfaces:
AutoCloseable, Device
public abstract class MeasureInstrument<Q extends Quantity<Q>> extends Object implements Device
Base class for physical measurement instruments. Integrates device capabilities with measurement logic.

Provides common functionality for scientific instruments including:

  • Instrument identification and location (Device)
  • Measurement capabilities and ranges
  • Calibration tracking
  • Measurement history

Since:
1.0
Author:
Silvere Martin-Michiellot, Gemini AI (Google DeepMind)
